input.sentences: i was so tired | but i had to make breakfast for my son .
meanwhile | my boyfriend is at a internet cafe with his friend doing a work project .
the waitress did not believe i was old enough | so she asked for identification .
my son was really being patient as i prepared his breakfast .
in the end i just ended up giving him some cereal | clearly he was so happy .
output.sentences: While mom is busy at work lets check in on daddy
Daddy is busy working from wherever he can to get the job done
here he is in his New York house finishing up before daddy duties kick in
and now its meal time for the little one
Oh boy the little one loves his cheerios!
